title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7009.7 - Food storage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7009.7 - Food storage

State Regulations

All food stored in a local correctional facility shall be
maintained in such a manner so as to protect against spoilage or contamination. Such foods shall be stored in compliance with the requirements of the State

Sanitary Code as contained in the Public Health Law or any rules or regulations
promulgated by the New York State Department of Health. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7009.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
